comments:
If a test case is selected rather than a test suite from the Run... Test 
launch configuration UI and then a deployment is selected, it seems as if 
everything will now launch.  Launch is possible but then fails due to 
execution components not being found for the test case test type (since it is 
not a test suite).  I am not sure if the defect is in the UI for allowing this 
to happen or in the execution for not having an execution component for a test 
case test type.
